name: COVID19LOINCValueSetForInfluenzaVirusAAndBSARSCoronavirus2AndSARSRelatedCoranavirusRNAPanel
title: COVID19 LOINC Value Set for Influenza Virus A and B, SARS Coronavirus 2, and SARS related Coranavirus RNA Panel
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to panels containing results for the detection of nucleic acid from SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19), SARS-related coronavirus, and influenza virus A & B RNA in various specimens.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes panels containing results for the detection of SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19), SARS-related coronavirus, and influenza virus A & B RNA in various specimens.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes individual components of panels.)

concept.display: Influenza virus A and B and SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) and SARS-related CoV RNA panel - Respiratory specimen by NAA with probe detection

contains.display: Influenza virus A and B and SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) and SARS-related CoV RNA panel - Respiratory system specimen by NAA with probe detection
